title: Tadej Pogačar Wants First Dauphiné Win to Reignite UAE Momentum Ahead of Tour de France
content:
UAE Emirates-XRG barrels into Critérium du Dauphiné with powerful team to back Pogačar and to regain momentum ahead of Tour de France showdown.

Read the full article at Tadej Pogačar Wants First Dauphiné Win to Reignite UAE Momentum Ahead of Tour de France on Velo.
author: ahood
